pkgmetadata.longdescription: Superpixel Image Segmentation // Image Segmentation using Superpixels, Affinity Propagation and Kmeans Clustering. The R code is based primarily on the article "Image Segmentation using SLIC Superpixels and Affinity Propagation Clustering, Bao Zhou, International Journal of Science and Research (IJSR), 2013" https://pdfs.semanticscholar.org/6533/654973054b742e725fd 433265700c07b48a2.pdf.
